thread.title: Juan Mata shines as Manchester United defeats Wolfsburg 2-1 in Champions League
thread.title_full: Juan Mata shines as Manchester United defeats Wolfsburg 2-1 in Champions League

author: Mohammed Uzair Shaikh
title: Juan Mata shines as Manchester United defeats Wolfsburg 2-1 in Champions League
text:
Juan Mata shines as Manchester United defeats Wolfsburg 2-1 in Champions League By Mohammed Uzair Shaikh on October 1, 2015 at 4:24 AM Comments 
Old Trafford, Oct 1: Manchester United got off the mark in the Champions League by defeating German club Wolfsburg. The star of the battle turned out to be Juan Mata who shifted the match in favour of Red Devils through his inspiring performance. 
As the high-voltage game began, United suffered a setback as Wolfsburgâ€™s striker Caliguiri wriggled past Darmian down the left and exchanged passes with Kruse. With finding the slot available to strike, he shot from a distance of 12 yards from the poles into the nets. The goal at the fourth minute boosted the morale of Wolfsburg. (ALSO READ: Manchester United on track! Juan Mata makes brilliant assist to Wayne Rooney in training (Watch Video) 
However, Manchester United fought back into the game by tightening up their defense. The tides of the match turned in 34th minute where Wolfsburg ended up paying a penalty for their stubborn defense. Instead of Rooney, it was Mata who smashed the ball into the lower left corner for an equalizing goal. 
Less than 10 minutes past the second half, the third goal of the match came. United star player Louis Van Gaal drove the ball into the nets along with an equally important assist from Mata. 
Moreover, it was a an exciting match, but Manchester United outplayed their opponents owing to an amazing performance from Juan Mata. The Spanish midfielder showed his worth in the all-important game.
